title: Veggieshop
description: An all-vegan clothing, shoes and cosmetics shop. Only carries bio-vegetable clothing and shoes or clothes made of raw material. Several brands have the Fair Wear label (originating from fair trade). The cosmetics are also bio-vegetable with no animal testing, plus most have The Vegan Society label. Is mainly an online shop, but to purchase certain products, you need to go to the store or the pick-up point in Izegem.
